abstract: A Taj Hotels property in London is taking reservations for a 1,832 square-foot suite designed to evoke the Jaguar brand.
snippet: A Taj Hotels property in London is taking reservations for a 1,832 square-foot suite designed to evoke the Jaguar brand.
lead_paragraph: Depending on your perspective, it's either an 1,832 square-foot hotel room or, in the words of a recently distributed media release, "a way to strengthen synergy" between two British brands. Those brands happen to fall in the portfolio of Tata Group, the parent company of Tata Motors.

headline.main: For Nearly $8,000 Per Night, a Bed in the Jaguar's Den
